name: Lula Sapphire
overview:
Focusing on safety, comfort, functionality and style, Lula Sapphire is much more than just a baby and toddler shop. The designs satisfy new parents who want the highest quality everyday baby essentials that nurture growth, encourage imagination and focus on the aspects those are good. Good for the environment, good for the development, good for playtime, good for delicate skin and good for blissful sleep.

It’s a wonderful treasure wander land inspired by designs and healthy choices, ranging from award winning swaddling blankets, to organic skin care & cloths, bouncers & chairs, monitors, thermometers and breast pumps; baby gyms, baths & bubbles, teethers, nursery toys, durable lovely clothes full of character; maternity wear, nursery furniture, themed toys, wall candy, wall posters, car seats and baby essentials which are loved, shopped and referred by loving parents.

Lula Sapphire cares about the world our children are growing up in and wants to ensure that the mark it leaves globally is everlasting. That’s the positive reason it is the first baby and toddler company to pioneer provision of carbon neutral products. It hopes that others will follow soon. Lula Sapphire also cares a lot about the people who make the products and it believes in reciprocation with respect to relations with employees.

Visit: - http://www.lulasapphire.com/ Email-ID: - info@lulasapphire.com Unit 6, Foxhills Farm Business Centre, Longcross Road Chertsey Surrey KT16 0DN Tel: 0844 272 6355.
